levels.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
levels.description: Learn the CIA triad, threats, vulnerabilities, and risk.

levels.title: Networking Basics
levels.description: Understand TCP/IP, OSI model, DNS, and common ports.

levels.title: Operating Systems (Linux & Windows)
levels.description: Master the command line and user permissions.

levels.title: Intro to Cryptography
levels.description: Grasp symmetric vs. asymmetric encryption, hashing, and certificates.

levels.title: Security Policies & Compliance
levels.description: Understand the basics of GDPR, HIPAA, and other regulations.

levels.title: Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
levels.description: Learn to think like an attacker to find and fix vulnerabilities.

levels.title: Web Application Security
levels.description: Understand OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities like XSS and SQL Injection.

levels.title: Digital Forensics & Incident Response
levels.description: Learn to investigate breaches and recover from attacks.

levels.title: Security Information & Event Management (SIEM)
levels.description: Use tools like Splunk or ELK to analyze security logs.

levels.title: Malware Analysis & Reverse Engineering
levels.description: Dissect malicious software to understand its behavior.

levels.title: Threat Intelligence
levels.description: Gather and analyze information about emerging threats.

levels.title: Red Teaming & Blue Teaming
levels.description: Participate in adversarial attack and defense simulations.

levels.title: Advanced Penetration Testing
levels.description: Explore advanced techniques for bypassing modern defenses.
